page.title: 07 Clubs
page.content: {Boys/Girls Brigade,Scouts/Cubs, St. {John's Ambulance Brigade}have a keen following but members have to go to Launceston for weekly meetings.Well supported are charities, local farmers loan fields for example for {Stock Car {Racing.}On the first Monday each month the{Monday Club}meet organised by and for a group of young wives but any one is welcome, entertained by visiting speakers.{Womens Institute}meet 1 day a month-a country wide set-up. The Youth Club age range is 11 to 17 years they meet in the Parish Hall,hold good disco dances,play Table Tennis,Pool or Snooker.They meet once weekly to coincide with the weekend and compete against other clubs.Youngsters are encouraged to hunt,ride and shoot.{ {Parent Teacher Groups}thrive to raise money for school needs, transport, books,computors,gardening equipment.
